snippet.title: Should Parents Protect Kids Online?
snippet.description:
Should Parents Protect Kids Online?
Toegevoegd door Chris Pirillo 2 jaren geleden
http://www.lockergnome.com/blade/2011/12/29/would-you-invite-a-predator-into-your-home-to-have-dinner-with-your-children/Creepy adults have been a danger to children for as long as there have been people. Sadly, our society's increasing reliance on technology has a dark side that such predators can exploit. How can you make sure your children are safely guarded against the evils of the world outside when they can be invited into your own home through the Internet and smartphones without your knowledge?You can watch the entire live TLDR episode here:http://youtu.be/pCqb8UKARUAhttp://www.lockergnome.com/subscribe/https://profiles.google.com/chris.pirillohttp://twitter.com/ChrisPirillohttp://www.facebook.com/chrispirillo
8 views
